subject: Cruelty to Animals
Dogfighting
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: All but one of 49 pit bulls taken from the Virginia property of Atlanta Falcons quarterback Michael Vick should be allowed to live, federal prosecutors said in a court motion.
snippet: All but one of 49 pit bulls taken from the Virginia property of Atlanta Falcons quarterback Michael Vick should be allowed to live, federal prosecutors said in a court motion.
